welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mentone, the charming mountain town known for its scenic beauty and thriving arts community. We invite you to explore our town and immerse yourself in its unique charm. We hope you enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Norton AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo flights and shipments at Norton AFB Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Banning Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Banning Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport handles all commercial flights and passenger services.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ontario International Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
